fields.description:
*Assessment*

Per [AWS Cloudformation documentation|http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-properties-as-group.html#cfn-as-group-loadbalancernames], if a {{AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup}} resource has the {{LoadBalancerNames}} property added, the resource should have no interruption.  While verifying EUCA-12860, it was noticed that as part of the stack being updated, the ASG resource that had a load balancer property added, created new instances, and terminated the old instances. The stack did update successfully.
